entry.title: Current Conditions: 21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 5:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Humidex: 27
Dewpoint: 17.4°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog developing this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 22 except 26 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning and late in the afternoon. Risk of thundershowers late in the afternoon. Fog retreating to the coast. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 22 except 26 inland. Humidex 31. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 11.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then clearing. Risk of thundershowers early in the evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
